        public TxHash request(Signer signer,
                      Function2<Signer,java.lang.Long,TxHash> transactionRequester)
        Try transaction request with a requester. If transactionRequester fails, retry after refreshing nonce.
        Parameters:
        signer - a signer to sign transaction
        transactionRequester - a transaction requester
        Returns:
        a transaction hash
